name: Dungeon Dash - Moray Game Jam 2017
description:
Created as part of the 48 hour Moray Game Jam 2017 by Team 'Openly Game Men' using the theme 'At first you don't succeed'. 2 Player head to head fast paced puzzle solver. Each puzzle is randomised per game.

You will need a mouse to interact with menus

Player 1 Controls:

  • WASD for 4 directional movement
  • Spacebar to pickup moveable blocks

Player 2 Controls:

  • Arrow Keys / Left Stick for 4 directional movement
  • Enter / A Button to pickup moveable blocks

Be warned, there are loud instances of the F word.
